optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats

Class HomogenousFloatMutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats.HomogenousFloatMutator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MutationInterface

    public class HomogenousFloatMutator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutationInterface
    Homogenous float mutator that mutates the values of float features in data points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HomogenousFloatMutator(float stDev, float[] lowerBounds, float[] upperBounds)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mutate(java.lang.Object instance)
      This method mutates the exiting solution without generating a new one.
      void mutate(java.lang.Object[] instances)
      A batch call for mutating solutions.
      java.lang.Object mutateNew(java.lang.Object instance)
      This method makes a new mutated solution, but keeps the original solution intact.
      java.lang.Object[] mutateNew(java.lang.Object[] instances)
      A batch call for generating new mutating solutions.
